column1: "description": "The Flexible power take-off (PTO) shaft designed and developed by CVRDE
column2: transmits the drive between engine gearbox and Accessory gearbox of Light Combat Aircraft (LCA) - Tejas. the name \"flexible PTO Shaft\"is derived from the fact that the shaft is able to accommodate large misalignment

column1: "title": "Power Take-off Shaft  for LIGHT COMBAT AIRCRAFT-TEJAS "
